thread.title_full: RG Riley reviewed by Lori A.

author: Lori A.
title: Lori A.
text: This was my first purchase from RG Riley and I didn't know what to expect so I just ordered 1 case. When it arrived I was very pleasantly surprised. I decided to jump in with both feet and ordered 3rds and imperfects. I was pleased to find that more than half of the 72 shirts were usable as is for my purposes, and the others had holes or flaws so tiny that I could easily work them into my tshirt designs. Only 2 of the shirts were too damaged to use and they will make good rags for my shop so still no loss at this price. I definitely will be ordering again and will probably make RG Riley my primary supplier. Great quality shirts, unbelievable prices, fast delivery, nothing to complain about!
